name: Room Fight
description:
This was a submission for Ludum Dare 37 (a 48hr game development competition). Theme: One Room

Vote for my game at:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move & interact with adjacent rooms.

R: Restart game.

Attack adjacent rooms to clear them out of the way and move your room to the goal. Remember to collect allies along to way!
